com.justai.zenbox.sdk

Class RequestData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.justai.zenbox.sdk.RequestData

  • public final class RequestData
extends java.lang.Object
    The RequestData class contains the user's query and additional data for request processing.

    • Method Summary

      • getData

        public org.json.JSONObject getData()
        Additional request data. You can fulfill this JSON object with some additional data like current timestamp, latitude and longitude and etc. depending on the set of currently enabled skills.
        Returns:
        a JSON object of request data.

      • put

        public RequestData put(java.lang.String field,
                       java.lang.Object value)
        An utility method to put any arbitrary field value into request data.
        Parameters:
        field - the field's name.
        value - a JSONObject, JSONArray, String, Boolean, Integer, Long, Double, or null. May not be NaNs or Double.isInfinite().
        Returns:
        this object.
